author: lgo
msg: Merge changes for 1.3.1 + last CHANGES file from trunk:
2079: Fix issue 113: add gssapi libs in the serf pc file
2081: Fix issue 116: scons check should return non-zero exit staths
2085: Fix issue 115: Setting RPATH on Solaris broken in SConstruct
2086: Solaris: Fix build with cc, don't use unsupported compiler flags

author: lgo
msg: Improve logging of bytes sent and written, and logging of connection reset.
(reset_connection): Use serf__log_skt to make clear which socket (local port)
(socket_writev): Log the nbr of bytes sent in SOCK_VERBOSE mode, so we don't
have to log the message content to follow up data transmission.
(socket_reader): Idem as socket_writev + fix crash while logging.

author: gstein
msg: Add a new vtable entry for performing the connection when a request
Also: future-proof with vtable version numbers.

author: gstein
msg: (do_conn_setup): the ostream stuff is insane. comment it.
